kyototycoon::Server

Network server abstraction based on TCP/IP. More...

#include <ktsocket.h>

Detailed Description

Network server abstraction based on TCP/IP.

bool kyototycoon::Server::set_timeout ( double  timeout  ) 

Set the timeout of each operation.

Parameters:
timeout the timeout of each operation in seconds. If it is not more than 0, no timeout is specified.
Returns:
true on success, or false on failure.
const std::string kyototycoon::Server::expression (  ) 

Get the expression of the socket.

Returns:
the expression of the socket or an empty string on failure.
int32_t kyototycoon::Server::descriptor (  )  [virtual]

Get the descriptor integer.

Returns:
the descriptor integer, or -1 on failure.

Implements kyototycoon::Pollable.

void kyototycoon::Server::set_event_flags ( uint32_t  flags  )  [virtual]

Set event flags.

Parameters:
flags specifies the event mode. The following may be added by bitwise-or: Server::EVINPUT for input events, Server::EVOUTPUT for output events, Server::EVERROR for error events.

Implements kyototycoon::Pollable.
